preferences.description: A list of push preferences for channels, calls, or the user.

channel_cid.description: Set the push preferences for a specific channel. If empty it sets the default for the user

chat_level.description: Set the level of push notifications for the user. One of all, mentions, none, default

disabled_until.description: Disable push notifications till a certain time

remove_disable.description: Remove the disabled until time. (IE stop snoozing notifications)

user_id.description: The user id for which to set the push preferences. Required when using server side auths, defaults to current user with client side auth.
